scripts.deps: npm install && (cd ../omega-pac && npm install) && (cd ../omega-target && npm install) && (cd ../omega-web && npm install && bower install) && (cd ../omega-target-chromium-extension/ && npm install)
scripts.dev: (cd ../omega-pac && npm run dev) && (cd ../omega-target && npm run dev) && (cd ../omega-web && npm run dev) && (cd ../omega-target-chromium-extension/ && npm run dev)
